job.title: Sr. Software Engineer - Front-End
job.description: stronguJob SummarybrbrustrongLowes is seeking an innovative resultsdriven Senior Front End Software Engineer to deliver innovative industry leading solutions As a Senior Software Engineer you will serve as a technical leader for your team You will collaborate with technical and product leadership across the enterprise to recommend build own and manage the solution stack for your products You have deep technical skills and aptitude to build products and solutions from scratch You will help establish best practices coding standards and will enforce design patterns to build sustainable products You will mentor your team members and will help eliminate knowledge silosbrbrThe primary purpose of this role is to work in an Agile Scrum development process to translate product features and user stories into logical program designs and to deliver software solutions following a CICD pipeline process using GIT and Jenkins This includes developing configuring and modifying engaging intuitive business applications within a webbased microservices environments This role facilitates the implementation testing and maintenance of new groundbreaking products by developing Reactjs UIsbrbrstronguKey ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliTranslates complex crossfunctional business requirements and functional specifications into logical program designs code modules stable application systems and software solutions partners with Product Team to understand business needs and functional specificationsliliCollaborates with crossfunctional teams to ensure specifications are converted into flexible scalable and maintainable solution designs evaluates project deliverables to ensure they meet specifications and architectural standardsliliGuides application and software development teams in the design and build of complex solutions and ensures that teams are in alignment with the architecture blueprint standards target state architecture and strategiesliliCoordinates executes and participates in component integration CIT scenarios systems integration testing SIT and user acceptance testing UAT to identify application errors and to ensure quality software deploymentliliParticipates and coaches others in all software development endtoend product lifecycle phases by applying and sharing an indepth understanding of complex company and industry methodologies policies standards and controlsliliHas solid grasp of software design patterns and approaches understands application level software architecture makes technical tradeoff decisions at application levelliliAutomates and simplifies team development test and operations processes develops detailed architecture plans for large scale enterprise architecture projects and drives the plans to fruition liliSolves complex architecturedesign and business problems solutions are extensible works to simplify optimize remove bottlenecks etcliliProvides mentoring and guidance to more junior level engineers may provide feedback and direction on specific engineering tasksliulstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongstronguMinimum QualificationsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in Computer Science CIS or related field or equivalent work experience in a related fieldlili5 years of experience in software development or a related field lili4 years of experience in database technologieslili4 years of experience working on projects involving the implementation of solutions applying development life cycles SDLCliulstrongemPreferred QualificationsbremstrongulliMasters degree in Computer Science CIS or related fieldlili5 years of IT experience developing and implementing business systems within an organizationlili5 years of experience building JavaScript based UI applications engineered for fault tolerance high performance and resiliencylili5 years of experience writing technical documentation in a software development environmentlili5 years of experience working with source code control systems like Gitlili5 years of experience in systems analysis including defining technical requirements and performing high level design for complex solutionslili3 years of experience working in an agile environment Scrum or Kanbanlili3 years of experience leading teams with or without direct reportslili3 years of experience working with Continuous Integration Continuous Deployment toolslili3 JavaScript unit tests AngularJSAngular 2 Vuejs Emberjs Lodash Underscore JQuery Bootstrap RESTlili3 years of experience expertise in TDD with unit testing tools such as Jest and EnzymeliliFamiliarity with UnixLinux environment and toolingliliFamiliarity with container platforms like Docker and container orchestration technologies like KubernetesbrliulstronguAbout LowesbrbrustrongLowes Companies Inc NYSE LOW is a FORTUNE 50 home improvement company serving approximately 20 million customers a week in the United States and Canada With fiscal year 2020 sales of nearly 90 billion Lowes and its related businesses operate or service more than 2200 home improvement and hardware stores and employ over 300000 associates Based in Mooresville NC Lowes supports the communities it serves through programs focused on creating safe affordable housing and helping to develop the next generation of skilled trade experts For more information visit LowescombrbrstronguAbout Lowes In The
